casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 7, 2008

[Cite as 02107/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-441.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0525. Nadra v. Mbah.

Franklin App. No. 06AP-829, 2007-Ohio-501. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of the joint motion of appellants’ and amicus curiae State of Ohio to participate in oral argument on February 27, 2008,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted, and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellants.
